snippet: The recovery has gained enough traction, White House officials say, that President Obama can make a robust case for how the accelerating job growth is likely to translate into higher wages.
abstract: Washington Memo; Pres Obama pauses before introducing Ashton B Carter, his nominee for defense secretary, to celebrate creation of 321,000 additional jobs in November; move is as close to victory lap on economy that Obama has taken.
lead_paragraph: The recovery has gained enough traction, White House officials say, that President Obama can make a robust case for how the accelerating job growth is likely to translate into higher wages.

headline.main: After Jobs Report, Obama Takes a Little Credit
headline.print_headline: After Jobs Report,Obama Takes a Little Credit

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
